ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD votes out American Idol, tears down TV's House and slam dunks the new NBA dress code. MAD also questions the dog-eat-dog world with inspirational animal stories. Plus, Spy vs. Spy, Monroe, The Strip Club and aging Elvis impersonators!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:08:20. [Issue ID 129296]
